attributes.action: Remove Sadiq Khan from Office he is not for the working class
attributes.additional_details:
Building for the rich pushing the poor into more poverty.
Properties are not for the likes of those in need but more for those who start with a salary of £100000 annum 
Working class are not considered
ULEZ does not exist just a ruse to get more money out of the drivers
Businesses will close down and UK will be bankrupt
attributes.background:
The working class have been wounded owing money instead of earning money to a scrupulous Mayor of London who thinks more of his football team than he does for his public.
He should do as Trump told him, sort out the problems in our country instead of looking  at what Trump does in his.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or to lose their job.

You could start a new petition calling for the post of Mayor of London to be abolished if that is something you would like to see happen.
